original_text: And also Maachah his mother, even her he removed from being queen, because she had made an idol in a grove; and Asa destroyed her idol, and burnt it by the brook Kidron.
korean_text: 또 그의 어머니 마아가가 혐오스러운 아세라 상을 만들었으므로 태후의 위를 폐하고 그 우상을 찍어 기드론 시냇가에서 불살랐으나

sentences.original_text: even her he removed from being queen
because she had made an idol in a grove
and burnt it by the brook Kidron
